I took my mother to Cramphorn Theatre, Chelmsford City to see Vintage jazz trio from Leigh-on-Sea, Essex named <> perform a Mother s Day special concert. They were excellent, with their unique mix of jazz standards, modern songs with a Daisy-Bowler twist and the pn-stage banter betwixt the band members. Thought they were so good, I bought one of their compact disks for my mother afterward. I would recommend their live show to anyone who enjoys easy listening from 1910‚Äôs to 1950‚Äôs ! Stephen Alden, Billericay
